data.text:
The location of the apartment is sensational - around from the corner is the Sagrada Familia - our appt didnt have a view of it, but some appts would. The view from the roof terrace is amazing - we went there twice in the evenings, a beautiful way to end the day
The staff are also very welcoming and friendly, the lady on reception explained everything to us very clearly. In addition, when we left behind some clothing and the lady on reception kindly contacted us to try and return it. 
The appt itself is modern and very clean / comfortable. 
If I had to make minor suggestions to improve it would be small things Eg 1) the coffee machine doesn’t have pods – you can buy them in reception but it would be a nice gesture to leave 2-3 just to feel at home immediately. 2) Cleaning – you can pay extra for cleaning service, however in all the other appts we have visited there is a daily change of towels and cleaning the kitchen 3) You cant leave luggage when leaving – there is a service you have to access – these things aren’t a big deal, its just the difference from feeling a little bit special on a luxury appt Vs feeling like a budget hotel where every attempt is made to minimise the cost of your stay. 
So in summary I would say 
Location, the appt, the staff – all amazing. The little touches that make you feel special ? – missing.
data.title: Staff, location, appt - all fantastic. Little touches ? - missing.

data.text: Just back from Barcelona yesterday and wow, what a place to stay, apartments were amazing, location was excellent, right round the corner from Sagrada Familia, 4 minute walk to the metro that will have you in the center of Barcelona within 15-20 mins and the staff were so helpful and friendly, We travelled as a group of 9 and had 2 apartments which were very spacious, well equipped with all the amenities that you require, lots of extra towels, blankets, pillows. Couldn't fault this place at all. EXCELLENT, thank you so much Sensation Sagrada Familia for a wonderful trip....
data.title: Amazing Place To Stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mcornforth, 

first of all thank you for choosing Sensation Apartments. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here with us, that you had found our apartments very well equipped, clean, tidy and with a good location. 

We will be happy to meet you again in a very near future

Tamara (front Desk)
owner_response.author: Sensation Sagrada Familia

data.text: We had an excellent stay. Staff were very helpful and the location was fantastic. We were able to walk to a lot of of great sights and the metro stop was super handy. We would definitely recommend the hotel for a great stay in Barcelona. Don’t miss the sauna and rooftop pool!
data.title: Great location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hello,

first of all, thank you for choosing Sensation Apartments for your stay in Barcelona.

We are very happy to see the staff was helpful with your questions or doubts and that the location was ideal to discover the city in a comfortable way.

We hope the apartment met your expectations and that we can see you with us again in the future.

Best regards,

Victor (front desk)
owner_response.author: Sensation Sagrada Familia

data.text:
We had a wonderful stay at the Sensation Sagrada Familia and were impressed by the quality and service of the front desk team. They were friendly, helpful, and professional throughout our visit.

The property itself was clean and well-equipped. It is located at a convenient location that is close to many eateries and supermarkets, and within a short walking distance of the tube/metro station. We were also able to store our luggage with the front desk for our early arrival before the room was ready.

Our apartment room was spacious and clean with a nice view of the Sagrada Familia. The apartment room was so comfortable that it was just like a home away from home. I would highly recommend this apartment hotel to anyone looking for a relaxing and enjoyable stay in Barcelona.
data.title: Memorable Stay in Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Glory,

First of all, thank you very much for choosing Sensation Apartments for your stay in Barcelona and for leaving us this great review.
Since we work with apartments, one of our main goals is making our guests feel like if they were staying at home far from home. That is why we try to equipe our apartments with everything necessary for a pleasant and comfortable stay. 

We are glad to see we could help you with any question or doubt at the reception, and that you found the location ideal so you could discover the city is something really valuable.

We hope you enjoyed the apartment and everything Barcelona has to offer, so we would love to see you again in case you decide to return.

Best regards,

Victor (Front Desk)
owner_response.author: Sensation Sagrada Familia

data.text:
Very highly recommended apartments.

Family X 4 plus granny for a week over the New Year. 

2 x bedroom suite.

Pros:

Very helpful staff.
Clean well appointed apartments.
Brilliant location next to Gaudi’s masterpiece 
40 secs walk from the Metro where you can be on the beach in 10 minutes or La Rambla in 7 mins.

Cons:

Wi-fi not great.
data.title: Brilliant Base for Visiting Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hello,

we would first like to thank you for choosing Sensation Apartments and for leaving us a review on Tripadvisor.
we are sorry if the WiFi didn't work as it should. When a lot of people connect at the same time, it sometimes work slower, but we are working on it.
On the other hand, we are vary happy the staff could help you with everything you needed and that the apartment met your cleaning expectations.
The location is great not only because of the view to Sagrada Familia but for the variety of transportation you can use to move around the city, too.
We hope you enjoyed the stay and would love to see you again.
Best regards,
Victor (Front desk)
owner_response.author: Sensation Sagrada Familia
